messages.title: Support endorsement by Lord Selkirk of Douglas
messages.content: Lord Selkirk of Douglas recommends Stewart Geddes as a person of great integrity who has the ability, vigour and vitality to be an excellent and hardworking Member of Parliament for Edinburgh West.

messages.title: Change of Government
messages.content: Calls for a change of government due to scandals involving Labour Ministers and emphasizes the need for honourable MPs who will not allow themselves to be bought and will publish expenses online.

issues.governance: Mention of recent scandals involving Labour Ministers and perceived contempt for rule of law and due process.

leaflet.personalStatement: Stewart Geddes pledges to be an honourable MP for Edinburgh West and not use his position for financial gain, with a commitment to publish expenses online.

contactInformation.address: EWCA, 16 QUALITY St. Lane, Edinburgh, EH4 5BU

endorsements.endorsement: Recommended Stewart Geddes as a person of great integrity who will be an excellent MP for Edinburgh West.

images.caption: Photo of Stewart Geddes with Lord Selkirk of Douglas
